content.question: Which of the following best explains why Romanticism is seen as a challenge to Enlightenment thought?

choices.label: Romanticism was significantly influenced by the French Revolution.
Romanticism was characterized by an emphasis on emotion as a source of truth.
Romanticism was influential in the study of nature and the natural sciences.

content.answer: Romanticism was characterized by an emphasis on emotion as a source of truth.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
